code: @Bean public ServletRegistrationBean<WebServlet> h2Console(H2ConsoleProperties properties) {     String path = properties.getPath().     String urlMapping = path + (path.endsWith("/") ? "*" : "/*").     ServletRegistrationBean<WebServlet> registration = new ServletRegistrationBean<>(new WebServlet(), urlMapping).     H2ConsoleProperties.Settings settings = properties.getSettings().     if (settings.isTrace()) {         registration.addInitParameter("trace", "").     }     if (settings.isWebAllowOthers()) {         registration.addInitParameter("webAllowOthers", "").     }     return registration. }
